reviews.text: These people know what they are doing. They are friendly, competent and customer focused.
Great Job servicing our systems, Cody Hood did an outstanding job servicing our two heating units. Efficient, fast, and professional
Cody was courteous, professional and very knowledgeable.
Serviced Installed Generac backup generator
The service technician was courteous and professional….no complaints.
Kyle did an excellent job on evaluating and servicing my generator. He was very professional , explaining what he was doing and making recommendations where appropriate.

Great company all around from the Electrical & HVAC technicians to the office staff!
Highly recommend!
Excellent organization to deal with all the way around. Great communication, friendly and informative folks, personable and go the extra mile to explain every step.
The technician was prompt, polite and professional.
None
I would like to thank Eric Grey for the great job he did servicing our generator. He was very thorough and efficient. We have used Capital Heating and Cooling for years and are very pleased.

Continued outstanding support after the sale. Ben just finished servicing my generator. He is always professional competent and pleasant. I have 100% confidence that we needed. My generator will perform.
None
Capital Heating and Cooling has wonderful professionals working for them like Bobby Swindle.
My technicuan, Matthew, was on time, very knowledgeable and explained everything he did. Excellent service!

We’ve worked with Capital Comfort Services several times, big and small projects, and we’ve been 100% satisfied every time. They resolved our generator issues, replaced our old HVAC system and repaired faulty (fire potential)wiring. Their team is highly qualified, professional and very friendly. We confidently recommend them to everyone!
Capital brings assurance and confidence while professionally examining equipment and making necessary corrections at a reasonable price. We are grateful!
Excellent and efficient service as usual
Everything went smooth, nice person, nice job

My technician, Kyle is amazing, reliable and pays attention to details.He ask questions regarding the generator and to see if it’s functioning properly. I appreciate Kyle and the work he does for our community.
None
Capital is top notch!  They take care of their customers.
Quick callback and very helpful service technician.  I have confidence in this company to keep me up and running.

Anyone who came here was extremely polite as well as knowledgeable. In replacing my generator, everyone carefully explained what they would would do and did it in a timely manner. I was very pleased with their service.
Mike was a grate tech 😁 professional, knowledgeable and timely all the way👏 enjoyed seeing him again. He changed and checked everything to make me warmer. Appreciated everything he did.
Great serviceman. On time guick and quality work on our generator as with our HVAC IN THE Fall.

Kyle arrived on time and went straight to work. After careful examination of my generator he confirmed that the radiator was leaking. He discussed  my options with me and we decided on a course of action.  He was very polite and friendly .  If I need my generator serviced again I hope they send Kyle.
Capital Heating is always there when you need them.  Matthew Harper, as always, was efficient and effective.  Issue diagnosed and all is right with the world once more.  Much obliged.
None
My technician was Kurt, and he was friendly and efficient! Service was performed, and he gave me a full update on my furnaces upon completion of the job. Excellent customer service skills!
Kyle arrived on time and quickly diagnosed the problem with my generator. He had the replacement part on his truck and had it fixed quickly. He also checked everything electrical before leaving.
None
None
We just had our first annual checkup. Ben was on time, professional, knew what he was doing. Capital is the best customer service team all the way around. !!
None
He was great in every aspect of the inspection

Responsive, professional, and thorough.
Said what they would do and did it.

1970 house which needed an upgrade on electrical panel and smoke detectors. They also installed a whole house generator. Capital were great from start to finish.
They were on time, communicated well and were professional in every way. If you live in Vestavia area, this is the company to work with.
I have never saw a group of men work together to get the installation done right. I am very pleased with Capital Heating and Cooling and will continue using them another 20 years. They are the best!!
Capital Comfort Services has top-notch technicians and our HVAC / generator maintenance visit went great. Cody and Kyle provided super professional and friendly service! Thank you!
Always professional service and friendly employees.
On time. Very professional and courteous! Quick response time. Gave a detailed description of what was done.
None
Great experience with Capital Comfort Services!!! Wesley and Connor did a fantastic job putting in our system! I loved their mannerisms cause theres not much of that in this world anymore!
Matthew and Capitol did a great job, as usual.

Kyle Boyd has been by several times to service my generator. He is very professional and is very thorough. I can say I have had good experiences with all of the technicians who have come by.

I highly recommend Capital Heating and Air if you are looking to buy a generator or for service.
Bobby was great! Knowledgeable and prompt.
Excellent installation. Service staff and office staff are great, considerate, and reliable.
None

Standby generator routine service contract maintenance. Ben was very professional, on time and got to work. Also a veteran and former Army Airborne soldier. All the way and then some...Hooah. Recommend.

Mike was professional and inspected our two furnaces and I asked him to change filters. He could have charged me for two filters but said that the upstairs filter was fine and didn’t need changing. I appreciated his honesty.
Luke was very professional and personable. He accomplished the annual maintenance most efficiently.
Mr. House serviced my Generac today he explained the process and the results.  I was impressed with the time he took to be sure I had any concerns answered.
None
Timely, professional and excellent communication.
Fantastic response and service!!
Very professional and courtesy . Great job of keep me informed

Kyle was prompt, courteous, knowledgeable, patient in teaching me different features of the generator.  Capital was clear in communication of cost, timing of the appointment and who would be doing the service. Very pleased with my experience with this company.
None
Bobby and Conner are very professional and friendly. I highly recommend Capital Comfort Services

Matthew was very kind, super professional and extremely knowledgeable!! he helped us figure out exactly what we needed and helped us keep it within our budget as well. Would recommend a million times!!
None

Capital Heating installed our Generac four years ago and we were very pleased with the entire process. We opted to purchase the 10 year extended warranty from Generac. This week our unit told us there was a problem so we scheduled a tech to check it out. Kyle Boyd with Capital responded in under 17 hours, immediately diagnosed the problem and replaced the starter.  No charge. Great company, great people, great service. I highly recommend Capital Heating.
None

I went with Capital even though they were a little bit higher than the other price and that is a decision I do not regret. Eric and his team did a great job. I am an Engineer so on such things I am not easy to please and I watched during the whole installation   I would definitely recommend Capital to a friend
Kyle was knowledgeable, friendly, and efficient.  We will definitely use him again.
Kyle was so professional and nice. Capital is always prompt and available when you need them!  Highly recommend!
Kyle Boyd serviced our Honeywell Generator and was here early and did a complete and very good job.

Best company I've ever worked with within this industry.

It starts with Cindy, who is world class; Matt (technician) has been professional and very respectful to us all.

Absolutely recommend without hesitation.
Eric was excellent! He was so patient and thorough. He took the time to explain what he had done as well as to make sure I knew how to check our generator in the future.

Lora and the Capital Team stand out with their expertise, professionalism, and dedication. Each team member takes the time to ensure that every detail is clearly explained. With a variety of budget-friendly options, you're sure to find a solution that perfectly meets your needs. The installation process is straightforward, and their thorough inspections at each stage provide peace of mind throughout.

I have had an excellent experience with every person at Capital.  Living in an area of Alabama that has frequent weather issues that cause power outages I’m glad I have a dependable company that makes sure my generator works properly.  It was money well spent.

Mr. House was exceptionally prompt, very professional and competent.  Very pleased with the thoroughness of his work.  Answered all my questions fully.  Will definitely be using him again and Capital Comfort services for all future maintenance and service work on our home genenrator.
Technician arrived on time. Courteous, informative and friendly. Completed work in a timely manner. Covered shoes when inside house. 👍🏻

Eric , fabulous, sincere communicator about my residential electrical needs;  explained options and costs and completed the work promptly.  I highly recommend Eric with Capital Comfort Services in Hoover Al.
None

Capital Comfort Services did a fantastic job installing our new Generac! All of the technicians were polite, personable & very well trained leading to a pleasant & speedy install. We would recommend them to our friends.
None

The hvac froze over right before the winter storm and Chad showed up within a few hours to help. Professional, knowledgable and took his time to evaluate the entire system. Very happy to get someone who has years of experience and cares about service.

What a fantastic company to work with… from sale of system to routine maintenance, they make it a pleasure to do business! Their office staff are delightful to speak with and scheduling is easy , too.

Their service couldn’t be better… left a message on Friday night that one of my A/C units was not working and their service tech Cody was here on Monday morning and got it fixed. They continue to amaze & delight!
None
Very nice
None
Them coming out when snowy & slippery today in the late afternoon was so appreciated!

Awesome emergency service for the Generac generator I purchased from Capital 7-8 years ago. I called at 3:15 on Friday because the "yellow" maintenance light came on. Mary told me to check the digital display in the unit to see if it had an "error code", and it did. The code indicated that the generator would not start if emergency power was needed. Mary spoke with Kyle, the technician on-call, and told her it needed to be addressed. Kyle was great!. Arrived at the house about 5:45 and got the generator working. He said it likely needed a new regulator but that it should work fine until they replaced it.
Great service, great people, great price, and great work! I would recommend them to anyone.
Expert and reasonable service for our aging generator.

Very satisfied. Kyle was very friendly and professional. He came a told me every step he was taking. He helped me make a decision on my needs for the best outcome. I will call again if I have any other problem. Very good service. 👍
Mike Land is an excellent tech. Very professional and helpful!
Very friendly and professional! He worked diligently to fix the problem and keep us informed along the way.
None

Capital always provides superior service to go with outstanding product selection.  They service my HVAC systems and also installed my backup generator (Generac) which they also monitor.  You can trust your home to Capital.

Capital Comfort Services does a great job keeping our 15+year old Generac generator running. They don't try to sell parts or services that you don't need. Their technicians are friendly and knowledgeable. Today, Kyle took the time to explain, in detail, today's service. I highly recommend Capital Comfort Services!

Matthew always provides great service.
So glad I made the move to Capitol!
Installed a Generator. The service and professional was excellent, from the office to the technicians. Highly recommend this company.

We have used Capitol Heating for over 20 years so obviously we are quite pleased with their service and attention paid to our HVAC requirements. We consider them to be fair minded. If something is not right after a service or installation, their excellent technicians make sure it is
corrected.
Mike Land seemed to be thorough and professional at what he does.  He took time to answer all questions and did so with a kind demeanor.  I would recommend this company.

I saw a red light alarm on the Generac and called Capital. We were on our way out of town and they sent Kyle who quickly diagnosed and replaced Night the faulty starter.  The Generac was fully restored by the time we got home.  Capital is professional and reliable.

Mike checked in the upper attic, one of the outside air conditioners to determine what was causing a strange noise in the attic area. The noise has stopped. Thanks for the good service. If I have any other problems will be in touch.
Matthew with capital comfort services is a top notch technician. Thorough , efficient & kind. 10/10!
None

This is THE most professional, comprehensive and hard working HVAC/Generator company with which I have ever worked. Eric, Kyle, the whole team right up to the Owner/Operator—Tommy are AAA+. They will be our go-to from now on! Should add…there were NO surprises…not a penny over estimate. Wish all appliance/service companies were this professional!
Matthew did a great job. We are long time customers. Capital does great work.
None

Capital Comfort Services was one of three bids to replace 2 of our heat pump systems.  The company we've used for years for our maintenance came in a bit cheaper; however,  the knowledge and insights Tommy Oswalt gave ua during our assessment was the deciding factor.  It was clear Tommy cared about the industry, the products he sells, and our needs.
Capital sent an absolute all star crew for installation, apologies as I've misplaced my list of thier names.  They worked throughout the day as an efficient team.  It's funny, but the little things - routing of pipes, clean and professional fit and finish - made it clear to us they took pride in their work.
Will will be using Capital Comfort Services for all our hvac needs going forward.  Thank you Tommy, installation team, and CCS.
Did a great job! Very polite, friendly. Kept me informed of what he did and checked with me before incurring addl costs. Will definitely use again.
None
None
Eric, Cody and Luke did a great job installing our main disconnect and upgrading our transfer switch.  Very professional.
Technician was professional, knowledgeable and very courteous.

First service visit for second opinion on HVAC unit failure. Kyle was professional, polite, obviously knowledgeable, curious, and thorough. He also called the manufacturer and discovered the unit may still be under warranty, which the competing previous service company denied. He also donned booties before walking on a $4,000 rug. The previous service company, with two different techs,  did not.
Great communications and tech showed up as scheduled, was very professional and took care of routine maintenance on our units as well as addressed an issue we had with vents in our finished basement.
Always on time, very professional

Kyle was fantastic.  Thorough,  professional,  knowledgeable.   Took care of everything efficiently.   Cannot say enough good words.
Thanks!
Kyle was great!!

The service was expert And fast. My service man was Bill Short and he explained the service needed and was prompt.
He did a wonderful job for me!
Eric Gray & the team at Capital were wonderful. They handled what we needed that day. Grateful to have them as a go-to!
Extremely thorough and friendly. I highly recommend him
Great company. Mike, and Kyle were attentive and so knowledgeable. Cyndi in the office helped with forms to be filled out.  Bill,  the motor worked till the new ac come😅
Tommy and his team are great people in general, fair, and professional. We've been using them for a long time on many different projects, and they've always been nothing but excellent!
None
Excellent professionalism.  Very friendly.  Responsive to all questions.
Prompt service and fixed the problem.
Super service.
Professional service excellent tech Matthew Harper … knowledgeable, respectful trustworthy. 5 star service !
Great service call! Matthew Harper is a hard worker, knowledgeable, and gracious young man. Highly recommend Capital and Matthew.
I have always received superior service and  have friendly experienced techs. Highly recommend.

Bobby / Tim / Conner / Kyle did a terrific job installing our new 4 ton + 2 ton systems today at our home. Timely, clean, courteous, and professional. Just what I’ve come to expect from Capital over 15 years of using them.  Looking forward to many years of enjoyment from our new HVAC and the new iWave-R air sanitizing systems that they installed.

Ben is knowledgeable, professional, and makes me feel like I am his #1 priority.
Would recommend Capital  and Ben to everyone.

If I could give ten stars I would. Got an email when my service tech was on the way. He arrived and quickly found the electrical problem and got it fixed. Thanks Eric and Tommy for saving Thanksgiving.
Kyle Boyd is so nice and professional!!!  I really appreciate dealing with companies this professional!  Thank you!!!
Very professional and easy to work with. I had my Generator serviced this morning. Im a very satisfied customer.

Great experience with Tommy, Bobby, and the team! They installed our new AC unit in a day, accommodated a last-minute thermostat upgrade, and Bobby did great work on the return duct. Highly recommend!

Kyle was great!
Took the time to teach me abt my generator.
Tested everything
We’ve never had a generator before so Kyle was patient.
Liked the dog also!!! And the dog liked him!

Micheal was kind, helpful, knowledgeable, respectful to us and our property, took the time to explain and show my husband and I what was going on with our unit And the best options we could go forward with to fix the issue. We would highly recommend Micheal and hope he is sent back to finish fixing our unit. Thank you Micheal!
Great service.  Quality and professional people.  Trust.
Just want to recognize Cody Hood’s excellent service to our 3 units last week. . He was prompt, professional and personable.Thank you Cody for a job well done.
Outstanding work by the 3 technicians! Arrived on time and ready to work. Explained in detail how the Generac system works.

Purchased a 22KW generator from them. From salesman coming to house to see what I needed , to the install crew , it was very easy. Professional install,  cleanup and walking me thru the operation. Wouldn't hesitant to use them again.
Very professional. Thorough. Look forward to a long-term relationship
Matthew was very knowledgeable and thorough! He did an amazing job! I always had a great experience with Capital!
Prompt, professional, straight to the point and to options, helpful with warranty information and quick service to restoral
I've been using this company for over 15 years. They are wonderful. they replaced both air conditionears, and service my generator.

Extremely professional Service and products, excellent communications and follow up throughout the installation and delivery. I would highly recommend this company ended employees.
Mike

The technician was very professional and courteous. Although my furnace is old, he was able to fix the issue at a very reasonable price.  I am overwhelmingly grateful and relieved and so glad I used Capital Comfort Services again (I use for residential and business).  Thanks again!
I am Linda young posting this review - Jason Green is my grandson and this is his google account!

Absolutely fantastic service. I had to have my entire unit replaced and decided to go with Capital based on a recommendation and I'm so glad I did! They took their time and did very professional work including re-digging and leveling the pad for the outside portion of the unit. The wiring and piping is neat and well done. Will definitely be using them in the future!
Serviceman, Mathew was very professional and polite.  He serviced our HVAC system.
Great service and the technician was very helpful. Would highly recommend.
Bill from Capital was great! In fact everyone from Capitol was above average. I would definitely recommend Capitol!
Cody was great
None
Always great service from Capital!  Their employees are friendly and so knowledgeable. Mike was so polite and helpful.  He did a great job.
Excellent service! Mike was prompt, knowledgeable, courteous and thorough! I have always had great service!
Great work and professional, friendly people.

Kyle was extremely courteous. He was timely, professional and represented your company very well.  He fits in perfectly with the type of techs that has always represented your company .  David Elliott
I trust Capital to show up, be professional, and get the job done right.  We have used them for over 25 years, and couldn't be happier with their services.

Tech was very professional and knowledgeable.  Respectful of property.
Completed work quicker than expected.

We highly recommend Capital Heating and Air they always do a great job for us. Their technician Kyle Woodard did a great job servicing our heating units.  They are always professional, punctual and efficient.

I am extremely satisfied with Capital's installation of my new 24kW generator. Four men came out and were on time and did an excellent job. They were all knowledgeable and polite. The installation went quicker than I thought it might and the location for the generator was a little difficult to get to. Highly recommend them.

Installed 24KV General generator in October 2021. All work was completed in a very timely manner with excellent quality! Today November 1, 2022 Ben performed the first year annual service and did an excellent job!

Excellent service, professional, and on time went the extra mile!
professional and reliable, highly recommend
We’ve used Capital HVAC for years and have always had great service from them.
Generator maintenance and HVAC maintenance
The best thing about Capital Comfort Services is the high standards & skills of the employees & the office staff. I can always count on them to give us outstanding service.

Your company Capital has 3 of the Best technicians people working for the Capital company plus Tommy Salesman who sold us the Awesome Generac unit.
My wife and I are extremely happy very very much so to do business with you .
I took pictures of the unit and are telling the story of how great the technicians were.all professional plus before they showed up to install your company sent by email pictures of all 3 technicians that was a great touch I am sure other companies don’t do . Thanks Ellis Naro . 10/19/2023
They are excellent! Bill short is both  knowledgeable and personable.It is a pleasure to work with him. Richard Crew

Second time working with Matthew Harper at Captial.  Very professional, prompt service.  Explained everything he was going to do and contacted me with any questions or updates.   Once completed, he updated me on the system and any of his findings.  It was a great experience and I highly recommended Matthew and Capital.   We used Capital years ago, but switched after some renovations and a new company installed the HVAC.  Very glad to be back working with Capital.
Always excellent service and customer friendly.

Capital Comfort Services installed two great new furnaces a few years ago and with their maintenance every six months they keep my heating and cooling in tip top shape! I’m very grateful for their excellent services! S Grimes

My technician, Kyle, with Capital Comfort Services is wonderful! He’s knowledgeable, friendly, never late, always helpful, and explains everything he’s doing thoroughly. I would never go anywhere else.
Kyle is polite, competent and clean. -  he is wonderful.

Kyle is professional, respectful, and will take the time to fully explain any repairs needed. He can carry a conversation well, and I'd be happy to refer him to anyone I know. Ask him about his dogs and you'll be his new best friend.
Very satisfied with services.  Kyle was on time, efficient and very thorough and respectful
Very professional people, and they were amazing to work with. They answered all my questions about my new generator and I would recommend them to others
Been using Capital Heating and Air for years.   Prior to working with them, we hadn’t had satisfactory service from several HVAC companies.   We’ve had nothing but positive experiences with CH&A
Technician arrived on time and was friendly and explained what he would be doing today.
On time, professional, courteous and knowledgeable.
Outstanding!

Excellent experience! Bill is a joy to have around. I like this arrangement of payment. Almost similar to a subscription paying annually knowing your HVAC is maintained. Considering a replacement Trane unit. Existing units some 21 years old. New concrete pad to prepare for replacement unit upstairs.
Always excellent service
Fine, friendly, knowledgeable young service man. Wouldn’t think of using anyone but Capitol. Ben with them for over 40 years’.
On time, friendly. Will use again.
The installation team was prompt, professional, and efficient. They were knowledgeable and explained the system to me prior to leaving.
Our tech was courteous and professional and we are very happy with the service
Great experience. Very professional , informative . Very nice job on the electrical and gas. Even loaned me a generator while the power was out. New generator looks great.
Matt is very knowledgeable, and he does a great job! He is friendly and courteous. We have used Capital Heating and Air for many years. We highly recommend this company.
Kyle was very knowledgeable and professional when he performed a check up on my generator.  I highly recommend Kyle and the company he represents.

The generator tech that showed up at my home was very polite and very knowledgeable of the generator. He was very neat and he cleaned up after performing the maintenance on the generator.  Outstanding job. He even educated me on some of the things about the generator. I will definitely be using them again next year.

Could not ask for better service!  Everything fully explained.
Thank you!
First time customer as new in town.  Awesome experience and worth every $ spent.  Will use Capital Heating and Cooling for all my HVAC needs
Great service! Very polite and friendly.
I was do glad to have Cody come and perform the service on our systems. He was knowledgeable and answered all of my questions. He is an asset to Capital
Very professional
Great company. Mike was very nice and professional and very informative.

Outstanding service … very knowledgeable!!
Great job!!!
None
Really great service with friendly technician. Would recommend Capital for HVAC services.
Excellent service.
Great guys, they carry a large selection of rib relays

I had the unfortunate issue of mold in my HVAC system that required significant remediation including drywall work, duct work, mold treatment, painting, etc. Jason and his team at Maestro were absolutely wonderful! They were particularly wonderful about communicating with me while he was coordinating all the services, keeping me in the loop the entire time. They were prompt, respectful and completed the services in a timely manner. I am so impressed with their services, I have enrolled in their home maintenance program, of which they have already come and done my first 27-point inspection. I highly recommend Jason, Maestro, and their team!
The service (with Dalen) was quick and professional. Plumbing prices always seem high to me, buy Maestro came in at a lower bid. Overall happy with the work and would use again.
Excellent work ethic that's difficult to find these days~

When we were unable to find someone to work alongside another AC company to look into some condensation and duct work issues, the Maestro team were able to step in and quickly handle each part of our problem - duct work repaired, ceiling repaired & repainted, by multiple people working for the same team. The one-stop-shop option made our repairs so simple and streamlined!

What a positive, seamless experience working with Maestro! We needed a hard core commercial cleaning after a 7 month gutted renovation to a 9th story condo. While Maestro was not the cheapest, I will say that the job they did was worth every penny. It was spectacular. Every . Single . Inch was spotless and sparkling. And the fresh, clean smell throughout the unit was refreshingly intoxicating!  Jason's Team of caring professionals took great care and pride in their work and I would highly recommend them for any commercial or residential maintenance.
I am still saying "wow".  Thank you Maestro for a job that exceeds the term "well done"!

Super convenient. You make a list of stuff that needs fixing, a super nice tech comes out and they fix all of it. Once a month, you just hand them a list of odd jobs and repairs and they knock it out. Love it.

I'm remodeling and old 1925 manor and I swear I find a new gaggle of small problems every few weeks, so this service is perfect for me and this old house.
Maestro did a great job! From the great quoting process, to the great work they did in my home, I cannot say enough good things. Highly recommend

We LOVED our experience with Maestro Maintenance. It was so easy to set up an account, send a work order, and set up our service time. Our technician was very professional, and helpful to explain everything going on and what he was actually repairing. He worked diligently to get everything up and running and went above and beyond to take care of needed plumbing repairs in both our kitchen and a bathroom. When the work was completed he cleaned up the job sites which was so appreciated. This company can handle so many home maintenance needs and we look forward to using them in the future!
Steve at Maestro Maintenance is the best!  He's quick, a good communicator and easy to work with.  I highly recommend their services.

This is the second time I have used Maestro Maintenance Management.  My daughters kitchen sink was clogged.  A plumber for one of those home warranty companies came could not fix it.  The Plumber from Maestro fixed it in two and one half hours.  He cleaned after himself.  Tested everything and once again it was perfect.  Let me add, this plumber came on Saturday.  Ask me if I am happy.  Thank you gentlemen.
Jason and the Maestro team where prompt and quick! Something that had taken me MONTHS to try to get an electrician out to do was done within 48 hours of contacting Maestro. Couldn’t be happier!!!

I called Maestro Maintenance because I didn’t know who else to contact. I needed the siding on my chimney repaired and needed help identifying a possible leak in my attic. Jason had someone out to look at everything immediately and it was all fixed within a week. They will be my go-to for all my homeowner repairs.

I’m so glad I found Maestro Maintenance! As a homeowner, I never know who to call if I need work done around my house. Now, I call Maestro and I know it will be someone who is trustworthy and dependable. The communication has been great. I have my 27-point inspection this week and can’t wait. What a great company!
None

Single mom who lives in an apartment on a budget. Needed a section of fence put up.  My first thought was it might not be a big enough project for this company to be interested in.  I was very wrong and very happy I didn’t let that stop me from contacting them. I sent a text that took me to a link with drop down questions about what I needed done.  Next I got a phone call invite to discuss details.  And budget.  Within 3 days I had a quote in my budget! Several days later the work was completed and better than I could have hoped.
Communication was seamless. The process was so easy. Workmanship was excellent. I will definitely be a repeat customer.  More than likely will be subscribing to their monthly subscription service.  Check this team out! I give them 5 stars 🌟

We have loved our experiences with Maestro. It has been so helpful to not have to deal with meeting with contractors to find the right quote or the right person for the job. And..any random handy work needed around the house or yard has been handled quickly for such a reasonable price. Highly recommend!!
None

Jason and everyone at Maestro were so very helpful! From the initial call, all the way to updates during the process, and completion. They did a great job with helping us get Christmas lights put up. From holiday needs all the way down to everyday household repairs I definitely recommend them! We will use them again for sure! Thanks Maestro!
None
Maestro was awesome helping us quickly take care of our carpet and upholstery cleaning needs. Great pricing, communication and service. We will definitely be contacting them again in the future.
I cannot praise the Maestro enough! Everyone is so kind, professional, reliable, and offers outstanding customer service. I would highly recommend Maestro!
None

Maestro Maintenance has been an extremely valuable resource for our organization. I cannot tell you how generous the staff is with their time. They came out to our organization multiple times to consult with us and walk us through some items that were way above our heads. They were patient, understanding, compassionate and very helpful. We continue to use Maestro and are grateful for the quality of work they provide us!

Maestro has been a tremendous relief for me in how they have managed multiple jobs. They have helped with plumbing jobs, access control issues, appliance repair, roofing jobs, landscaping jobs and any problem I can throw at them. Their communication sets them apart.

Maestro has been a game changer! They are so professional, trustworthy, and thorough. I love not having to deal with scheduling, meeting, or monitoring contractors anymore. They take the pain out of maintenance. Highly recommend!

Maestro is a wonderful partner to us and we love having them as our property manager because they are a pleasure to work with and they do great work! They are able to manage all of our maintenance and repair projects and needs so we can focus on running our business!
None
None

Having moved into the Odenville area recently, we needed HVAC duct upgrades to our home. Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning was recommended by a family member. We contacted  Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning. We can't say enough good things about Austin and Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning. Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning responded in a timely manner, addressed our needs, to include costs, performed the required work, and finished the upgrades in a very timely manner. All work was very neat, clean and  professional. We are blessed to have Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning in our lives to meet all our future HVAC needs. Thank you Full Force Heating & Air Conditioning!

First, let me mention that I have never written a review for any company or even a product I've purchased and loved from Amazon but Gipson Heating & Air Conditioning deserves a review.  I don't even know where to begin because they are so AMAZING.  The owner of this company literally has the key code to my front door because he is so trustworthy.  I wouldn't hesitate to let him babysit my children because he is such a great guy.  His staff as well.  My story is unique because what started with me calling him out to talk about a duct cleaning turned into my husband and I gutting our entire home for a remodel (for other reasons) and we wanted a brand new system.  Shane came out to do a load calculation to help us pick the perfect system.  He was so detailed that he climbed into the smallest, most cringy area underneath a stairway landing in my basement. I felt like I was watching the show Fear Factor because you couldn't have paid me to crawl under there!!  We sat down at the table and he explained with so much detail the system I needed.  What I found to be so funny, is that I have never met a HVAC guy that was so passionate about his work.  I thought I was going to have to kick him out because, at one point, I think he started doing algebra equations based on how many windows I have and insulation in the house and whether the sun rises or sets on backside of my roof...LOL.

Anyways,  this remodel has taken two years and I don't know how many times he came out to my home to help me before I ever paid him a dime.  I have a longer chain of text messages to him than I do to some of my friends.  He has just been there to answer every...single...one of my questions. I have a beautiful new HVAC system now, all new ductwork, gas lines for my hot water heater and two fireplaces and an additional ductless, mini split system installed.  There is not a better, more skilled, or more honest HVAC company in this area....period!!

I would recommend them for any service especially if your dryer isn’t performing the proper way. I can’t say enough about Shane and his amazing crew. We had him come out a few months ago to repair our HVAC system. He did a wonderful job fixing it after the company who installed it really messed it up. I thought we were having problems with the same system again because water randomly began leaking through our ceiling which is what had happened in the past, so my first thought was, “Uh-oh, the air conditioner is malfunctioning again.” So I called Shane to check it out and it turned out to be our hot water heater. First of all, he answered my call on a weekend when he was doing other things on his own time and made our problem a priority to fix, which I truly appreciate. And instead of referring me out to someone else to deal with it since it wasn’t an HVAC issue, he came out and replaced it himself and made modifications to ensure it could never leak through the ceiling again. Also, he discovered in the process that a faulty valve had malfunctioned on the outside of our house and was causing extraordinary water pressure on the inside, which had cost us thousands of dollars in repairs and appliance replacement, (including the water heater!), over the years! No one had ever been so thorough as to investigate something as simple but as impactful as the water pressure in our home, (and we had other big companies come out over the years). But Shane did and he even fixed that issue- spending literally hours digging out and replacing the broken valve in our front yard. We are so thankful that Shane was there to help us out. They really are jacks of all trades at Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning and are truly knowledgeable about many things across the board in terms of repairs. I have since referred others to Shane and Co with full confidence that he and his crew will always do the job right for a fair price, without taking advantage of people in the process, and will go above and beyond in the quality of their product and services.  And that, in and of itself, is worth more than anything to me. I do truly appreciate these fine people and cannot say enough good things about this company.

I cannot say enough about Shane- owner of Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. In order to give a better understanding of my situation let me say, without the intent of trashing anyone or their business, that when our system was replaced two years ago by the company that installed it, (who I also called for help yesterday when it stopped working), it malfunctioned quickly and flooded a bedroom ruining drywall and requiring extensive repairs. Eventually it had to be completely replaced as it never functioned properly. The replacement system needed a few tweaks, but eventually it seemed to work consistently and well and did for nearly a year- until yesterday. So, I contacted the company who installed the system and they were unable to come out immediately, nor could they give me a timeframe for their arrival.  It was 80 degrees inside, I have pets, and I needed someone there sooner rather than later. Shane wasted no time in getting to my house to assess the system and set to work immediately. In the process, he educated me on the system and gave me a complete rundown of what exactly was wrong, including a list of issues caused by the installers of the system, which were contributing to the malfunction of it. He also hauled off a large garbage bag of trash that the installers left in my attic! Additionally, his service charges were so reasonable I actually questioned him about it! His reply was basically that he would rather be good to customers, charge reasonably and fairly, and get great reviews and referrals than charge exorbitant amounts of money for his services! I was blown away! Now my air is working beautifully, I didn’t spend a fortune to get it fixed, and he has a customer for LIFE. Try Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. Their work ethic, professionalism, quality work product, and positive results speak for themselves!

The quality, value, professionalism, responsiveness and dependability options in this survey all apply to Gipson Heating and Air but honesty is what I like most about this company. They have Serviced my 15 year old home unit for two years now and have never tried to sell me a new unit. Shane (the owner) always says he can keep it running with routine service and by topping off the freon at the beginning of each summer. He recommends this as it is cheaper for me and the best option with kids in college and a new unit is not needed right now. Previous HVAC companies pitched the need for a new unit based on age before even inspecting it.

But when it comes time for a new unit, as it was when Gipson replaced the 30+ year old unit in our rental house this summer, it was another positive experience with this company. Shane checked the unit, explained why this unit could not be repaired (it had rusted through in many areas) and recommended the best and most affordable unit for replacement. He even set me up with financing which allowed for payoff in six months with no interest.

It’s a very vulnerable feeling when you have problems that you don’t fully understand and feel like you are at the mercy of the repair tech’s information. I don’t have this feeling with Gipson as they take the time to explain and actually show you what the problem is before making the repair (Shane sent pictures to me at work when a fan motor needed replacing during last summer’s service).

I cannot recommend this company enough strictly based on their honesty and work ethics.

A friend recommended Gipson so we called them around 10:00 and told them about our situation. After nearly 40 years of homeownership, can say without a doubt that working with Gipson Heating & Air was one of our best experiences. Knowing we had two 20 year old HVAC systems, we were faced with replacing both systems. As a result, we did our due diligence to obtain quotes, which sadly took over a month to get three that were actually apples-to-apples .

We were nearly ready to pull the trigger when we came across Gipson. Not only did we get a quote FAST, but their quote was incredibly detailed; including sketches of our ductwork. In retrospect, this wasn't a big surprise, since Gipson actually did a full, comprehensive review, well beyond the cursory inspections the others did. Gipson asked questions the others didn't, revealed critical items the others missed, and provided additional details that truly benefited us. Their best suggestion was flipping a horizontal system to vertical. Yhis change gave us a tremendous amount of additional attic space, a genuine bonus!

We could go on singing Gipson's praises but will wrap up by simply saying all work was performed exactly as quoted, the installation was top notch, was done as promised and on time. If you need HVAC work done, one call is all you will need - and that's to Gipson.

It’s not often that I post reviews on businesses but I absolutely had to review these guys! I’ve NEVER worked with a company so professional and prompt! These guys not only KNOW THEIR STUFF, they explain the findings/process in a way that those of us who are less HVAC inclined can actually understand. Even more...they’re affordable! They took pictures of everything and explained to us their findings while showing us the photos! They also sent those photos to us with the inspection report so that there would be no doubts when we sent that same report to the sellers to request repairs. These guys have great communication and they just seem like genuinely good people! A day or so after, when we had received our report and they had been paid (and we didn’t expect to hear from them again until we had more hvac needs) I received a message from them just informing us that the seller had contacted them to price repairs. This was not something they had to do, but they did it anyway. Like I said, they’re just genuinely  good guys! I’ve boasted about them to anyone who will listen. They truly went above and beyond what we expected. I read reviews before purchasing ANYTHING so I know how important these reviews are to future customers! Listen...book these guys! My experience with Myers Comfort Specialist of Birmingham has been frustrating, disappointing, and still ongoing. When my gas heat went out last Tuesday Feb 11th, I called American Home Shield which is my home warranty. They sent Myers my contact info with Phone and email. I called Myers this morning over a week later from the initial call to ask if the part came in bc it was below freezing at 22 last night. That is when they tell me they have called my deceased husbands contact info on Tuesday to let him know the part arrived. I’m unsure how they got my deceased husbands info, but that isn’t the info we had been using to communicate with about ordering the new part for this service. Despite extreme freezing temperatures today and tonight they have failed to prioritize my situation, and my son and I have been left without heat for another night again. It will be 17 degrees for the low tonight. I can’t believe them knowing this and having the part on hand, will not send anyone out bc everyone has left for the day by 9am in the morning per the manager and assistant.

We had both plumbing and HVAC work done by Rick about 9 years ago. We thought everything was great because he seemed really nice and knowledgeable well we were wrong. After a few years we noticed that there was a strange smell that we couldn’t figure out where it was coming from in the kitchen and front bathroom. There was small flies coming out of the drain in the front shower bathroom. Rick would not return our calls so we called another company. Come to find out he did the plumbing all wrong and not to code. He used the wrong size pipes under the garbage disposal and all the food and water was going under the house into the crawl space. 3000 dollars later we got the work corrected.
You might be questioning why I am posting this now.
We just ran into someone who recently had a horrible experience with Rick and I thought I would share my experience so others would not fall into the same trap.

On Nov 10th, no one showed up.  I called on the 11th and was told I would have to wait until they could put me back on the schedule and it would be Monday, Nov 13th for the repair.  Once again, no one showed up. Called again and was told they are now coming on the 14th, no one again, and happened again on the 15th.

Every time I call ANY number I can find for Sears Repair its either disconnected and automated recording with no option to speak to a living breathing person!  ANY number I am given by the call center regarding my warranty repair, gives the SAME automated message with no option speak to a live person that can directly and personally respond to this outstanding repair.

It is absolutely absurd that there are no working numbers for the local repair businesses Sears has doing their repair work.  More absurd that no option to get connected or dispatched to local business is an option.  The call center can talk to the local busiess but the person who pays for the home warranty cannont.

The ONLY positive thing I can say is the repair man who came out to diagnose the problem, was very professional and helpful.

Today is Nov 16th and I am still waiting for a confirmed time for repair.  Meanwhile the temp is in the 20's and 30's.

(Supposedly, one of the members of his crew remembers where the fixture is supposed to go). The sales experience was wonderful. Now the we have leaks the support service has been great. However, in between all of that was a huge headache. The crew showed up unannounced. They installed the wrong products on the roof. They left a mess when we were promised that there would be clean up everyday. We were told they at would have but the project coordinator didn’t schedule a dumpster. The project coordinator also did not clearly tell the crew what products were to be installed where nor did he tell them where to drop off the products. Not exactly sure what what the project coordinator did. I do have to admit that I’m am analyzing his job more critically as I am the project coordinator at a law firm. Our siding was damaged as well as our ceiling in our kitchen.

The siding was repaired as requested, the house was cleaned as requested, and the flat roofing did get installed where it should have been.

We are still waiting for the reimbursement for the kitchen celing repair even though we submitted an estimate for the repair from a contractor.

We now have three leaks in our celing. I am extremely dissatisfied at this point in time. Sears was the more expensive option and we went with it because of the promise of excellent service that came with the sears name.

With these leaks we have more celing damage and now possible window damage.

My husband and son were very nice to handle the Shoe Molding removal for them. Our initial agreement when the porch was measured was to handle ALL of the Shoe Molding necessaries. I do not blame the installers and they did a nice job with what they could accomplish. reviews.text: Came out quickly. Very personable and down to earth. Diagnosed my issue and got my heat working at a fair price.

When I say that I received outstanding service from this company, I truly mean it. They were honest, efficient, and incredibly thorough. I am very grateful for their help. I highly recommend them to anyone seeking top-notch service; they truly provide the best quality.

Bo was the best! I had my air conditioner installed two weeks ago with another company. It started acting up so my home warranty sent Bo to fix it. He fixed the initial issue and then it quit working again thay night. He promptly showed back up the next day and fixed it even though I couldn't make it home. Super friendly and amazing to work with!

Bo Jiffy serviced my almost 28 year old air conditioning unit. They came out quickly and had great communication. They diagnosed the problems and came back the next day with the parts and fixed my unit while I was at work. I would definitely use them again. Probably the best ac service I have ever had.

The guys at Bo Jiffy are truly heaven sent. Larry and Flanders came to our home this morning and fixed our leak and also took the time to explain what caused it. They are truly men of the cloth. I'd give them 10 stars if I could.
Very unprofessional and had the nerve to urinate on the side of my home 🤬🤬🤬🤬

Cannot say enough good things about Bo Jiffy Heating and Air. We have had numerous problems with our HVAC unit since moving into our Pelham home 3 years ago. Today, I called our home warranty company as we had a problem that another company tried to fix 35 days ago. Our unit would shut off which made the home very cold (or hot) depending on the season, and sometimes unlivable. Bo Jiffy came out within 4 hours to fix our problem and ensure we didn’t freeze as the temperature plummets into the mid to low 30s tonight. They were beyond accommodating and understanding. I will be requesting Bo Jiffy any time I call my home warranty company for HVAC repairs in the future. Do yourself a favor and seek these guys out. You cannot go wrong.

So thankful for Bo Jiffy Heating & Air. We filed a claim through our home warranty, First American, and it was assigned to a different contractor. This is the third company who had worked on it in less than a year, all assigned through FA. After going without ac for three months with two adults, three kids, and two dogs in our home we pushed for them to assign a different contractor. On a Thursday, after fighting with FA and the other contractor (Elite Air) over missing/wrong parts, FA finally assigned our claim to Bo Jiffy. He came out the next morning and we had ac within a few hours. He showed me exactly what was wrong, recharged the unit, and we have been good to go since! Highly, highly recommended!

Bo is a fantastic technician. I had a terrible experience with my previous home insurance company, Orph Home Insurance. They sent me at least six different technicians over the course of two months, but none of them were able to fix my HVAC unit. Bo came and took his time to diagnose and fix the problem in just two days. He was very pleasant to talk to, and I would definitely call him first if I ever have another HVAC issue.

Bo Jiffy was prompt, friendly and quickly diagnosed the issue.  They located the part even and fixed the furnace less than two hours of their arrival.  This was all done despite the fact it was late afternoon on a Friday.

We were miserable for days and they came to our rescue. It took longer than expected, but our home warranty was to blame for the delay. We really appreciate this company and what they did for us.

Super friendly, personable, and left us very grateful for cold air in this horrible heat!

Bo Jiffy Heating and Air is the best company around. They were very friendly, professional, knowledgeable and personable. They fixed my issue promptly and with a pleasant attitude! I will be recommending Bo Jiffy to everyone I know!!!!! Thanks for the world class service which is hard to find these days!

Bo Jiffy Heating and Air came out to my house, still dressed in his Sunday church attire,  to check my A/C unit.  I could not have been more appreciative.   Great, caring person, of which I highly recommend.

None
PERFECT!!!!!!!

They have been amazing. We have unfortunately had to deal with quite a few AC companies recently, and BoJiffy has been outstanding. They are extremely professional and knowledgeable, and have explained everything in an easy to understand and no nonsense manner. I would highly recommend them.

I wish I could give them ten stars because they deserve every one.  Bo Jiffy is our heat and cooling company from now on warranty or no. 4 different companies  were sent out. The first tech couldn't figure it out, the second tech rigged it up to run on heat strips which meant the air would never work, the third guy said that we needed a new system that of course the warranty company would not cover. Robert from Bo Jiffy was the charm. He was thorough and checked the system back and forth multiple times. Even once he had everything up and running he ran the air tested it then the heat and tested it then the air again and then the heat again. So far so good.  He was quick professional and best of all he actually fixed the issue. Robert kept us informed about his location so we were not waiting all day wondering when he would show up. I can't sing their praises enough. This is one very satisfied customer.

I am so impressed. I was super leery  of dealing with another technician because the people that our warranty company has been sending out have been quite awful. He restored my  faith in the warranty company and repair people all of them aren't awful money grubbing liars even though most of them seem to be. Rest assured they will be thorough and take care of you. If you have choice warranty I suggest you cut out the headache and specifically ask for this company. They are worth the wait if there is one. Our work order was put in on Saturday they were out here  on Monday.

I love to have reasons to compliment a company and they gave me plenty.

Bo personally called when the warranty company said it would be the next day or the day after and had Robert out that evening. Robert recommended a new unit and got us up and going until the new unit could be ordered and put in. They were very professional and answered quickly to get us back up and going in this summer heat. 10/10 recommend and will use them for any other heating and air issues!!

We are now having to buy an entire new system out of pocket due to our home warranty sending companies like this out and fix water damage out of our pocket! Also, they are completely unprofessional. 2024 UPDATE: The review above is older.  Today is 8/14/2024. It has taken me months to update this review of a company I think so highly of but we are in a marketplace and as a consumer, I would want to know. Previously (appx 4-5yrs ago) Wright replaced a blower motor in my ac unit. The cost: just under 800.00. In late May / early June 2024, the same company replaced the same part (Different technician). The cost: 1645.00. It was hot, Im menopausal, I panicked and let them do the repair; YES I should have checked with another company. Today's review is to inform, not to slander. I had the thermostat replaced by another company. That company told me that their cost to replace the motor would have  been close to the 800.00 rate I'd paid previously. Wright's technicians have always been professional and friendly. However, I dont know if that 1645.00 was an honest rate for the job. Just a quick FYI and dont panic like I did. Reduced my rating from 5 stars to 3 because they more than doubled the rate for the same job.

Affordable heating & Air was assigned my claim through American Home warranty.First off let me just say Thank you Russell for fitting me back on the schedule after I missed my appointment …Russell came out diagnosed what the problem was with my Unit and got right to it.I thought he was going to have to come back another day to fix everything but no he fixed everything in a timely manner.He explained everything to me that was going on with it and showed me everything he was replacing.Now I have Air thanks to Russell I’ll definitely recommend to others

Best AC business that I've ever dealt with.  We noticed that the upstairs AC was suddenly not cooling properly on a Sunday afternoon. Russell with Affordable Heating and Air called me early Monday morning and was quickly here to diagnose the issues with the unit.  I needed a new fan motor, and I expected that it would take several days for the part to arrive and be installed.  However, Russell was back the following morning and had us back up and running in a matter of minutes.  Great AC service, great customer service, and I wouldn't recommend anyone else.
Russell was extremely friendly and comes with an extreme amount of expertise. I wouldn't use anyone else! Highly recommended!!!  Fixed my heater with a smile on his face.

PLEASE READ before you use this company. We originally were sent Affordable Heating and Air through a claim with Old Republic in 2021. They came out and fixed what was needed and we had a good experience. We flip and rent houses and have had multiple units replaced through Old Republic through Affordable Heating and Air. They told us to contact their nephew Nate (their technician) for our needs and we have for years. In Dec 2023, Nate quoted us a unit and we sent him money for it. Weeks went by without installation and then he said he needed more money for an upgrade of which we sent. $5,200 WAS STOLEN FROM US. When I say stole, he literally texted us and told us he USED OUR MONEY FOR CHILD SUPPORT AND WILL PAY US BACK. I have the texts. It’s insane. But what is more insane is that his family and owners would let a long time customer be robbed and not make us whole. It tells you everything you need to know about how they run a business.

We contacted his aunt who is the owner of the company and even after hearing everything, she offered for us to pay $4k MORE at supposed cost to “make it right”. We originally said no that we wanted our unit for the price agreed upon and we wouldn’t be outlaying any more money until it was installed. Two days later once we realized we just needed to get it done, we call back and say fine, we will pay the money and just lose out on the rest since you won’t take responsibility for your employee/nephew that STOLE FROM US. At that point she then said that they no longer were offering a discount and basically told us to fly a kite. If you do use them, do not outlay any money until the unit is installed. I hope Old Republic will end their contract with them so nobody else is a victim like we were.

I took this review down originally because after posting it, the owner Russell called me to tell me that he really would fix it and he was sorry that there was a miscommunication. We talked for 30 minutes and I agreed to take it down. After a week and a half has gone by and he refuses to answer or return my call, I have no choice but to put it back up. I am the only victim here and have still not received my $5,200 back that was stolen from me. These people are thieves and liars. I cannot believe they think it is okay to conduct their business this way. My sister also paid them $2,000 for work that we can also not get a call back on. Do not associate with this company. The Alabaster inspector says he will be reporting them to the state board.
Russell was great! Super friendly and got our heat working again right away. We will definitely use them again!

reviews.text: Excellent experience with Russell and Affordable Heating & Air. Russell was on time, personable and professional. He figured out the problem quickly, replaced the part and our heat was back up and running! Highly recommend Russell and his team for heating and air work.

Affordable Heating and Air was giving an appointment to service my home and the technician never showed up! My appointment was scheduled for Friday and the technician called and stated it was raining ( not sure what rain has to do with an inside unit) and needed to reschedule that next morning between 9-10. Technician Nathaniel Brooks was a complete no show. After rearranging my entire day and LEAVING A VOICE-MAIL this guy never calls back to say anything. I call Monday morning and the supervisor, by the way was very helpful, stated Mr. Brooks FORGOT TO PUT ME ON THE SCHEDULE....HOW!? Even With that being the case I left a voice message on his phone THAT MORNING! So you don't check your phone all day..OK
More frustration added to a more frustrating situation. Highly Disappointed
Dependable, professional,   efficiency and about thier business and make its seem like  it's a pleasure to service you,
Really awesome experience. Russel came out to fix our heat and did a fantastic job. He had the parts and knew exactly what to do. So happy that our home warranty sent them.

Affordable Heating & Air is a horrible company no ethic no professionalism, does not know how to communicate effectively and the man they sent out didn't know 2hat he was doing 2mos on going issue..Instead of the lady saying they can't do the job..she lying to.
Russell was fantastic! He really knows his trade.  His goal was to keep our units working without needless costs. We highly recommend  Affordable Heating & Air.

Affordable Heating and Air was sent to my house as part of American Home Shield Home Warranty program. The technician NEVER put a gauge on the condensing unit to check refrigerant levels. Instead he told me Ahs required him to put Freon in the unit; although, it leaks the refrigerant out, and he said it would cost $1432.00 out of my pocket. He told me what a horrible company Ahs is, and while I agree, he attempted to price gouge me at a $199.00 per pound, I’ve been paying $50.00 per pound. He never asked if I wanted him to, but rather stated, “I know you don’t want me to do this and I don’t blame you, if it was mine, I wouldn’t do it either. I’ll send in the report telling them what I found.” He sent in the report and stated customer refused to allow him to add refrigerant. He did not have to add 8 lbs of refrigerant to test the system, but this was his way of making a quick buck thinking unsuspecting customers will not know. I would highly recommend you FIND
ANOTHER COMPANY to do your hvac work. The audacity of attempting to charge $200 per lb is ignorant at best and is the definition of a scam artist at worst. The lies to me and deceptive trade practices by never putting a gauge on the equipment, and stating I refused is repugnant. DO NOT USE these folks, and never buy a home warranty from American Home Shield, I’m wondering now if they are colluding to unsuspecting customers?

I have had a very bad experience with Affordable Care Heating and Air. My home warranty gave them my claim to fix my heating and air in November, that was 3 weeks ago.  They order a part for heating and picked the part up last Wednesday. The people said they would be giving me a call to put the part in, the part is the condenser part on the heater., they picked the part up last Wednesday. The people said they would be giving me a call to put the part in, so I waited to receive a call back.  I didn't receive a call back.  Home Warranty said that Affordable Care Heating and Air would be giving me a call back.  They first came to put the blower in the heating unit upstairs at the beginning of November. Instead of fixing the downstairs heating, they closed the case.  So I am left sitting in the freezing cold. I called the company, they were supposed to fix the claim. They had to order the parts. The part came Wednesday before Thanksgiving. They said they would put the part on Monday and give me a call. I received no call, no txt, no nothing. I call back to the company to see when they were putting the part in. Owner of Affordable Care company called said they withdraw claim because I have been harassing them. Now I have to start the procedure all over because the women lied on me. I never harassed anyone. I only called the company one time to see when they would be fixing my heating unit.  Not only that, but I am still cold and don't have any heat. Furthermore, I feel like I have been lied on by the company. I do not recommend anyone do business with this company. If she lies on me, who else will she lie on. I'm freezing with no heat because of a lie she told just to get out of fixing my heating unit.
These are some of the best I have ever dealt with… professional, helpful, and understood that we needed some extraordinary help during a difficult time. Highly recommend Russell and his team.

This business is very unprofessional. My appointment time was from 9-2, as it got closer to 2 my husband called. He was advised he will get a 30 minute courtesy call which never happened. About 4pm he continued to call and AHS continued to call and didn't get an answer. About 8pm I got a text after I left a voicemail, letting them know how unprofessional they are. You think they would know that the courteous thing to do is to call a let your customers know your not coming or running late. They text and asked could they schedule us for first thing Saturday morning which we agreed. First thing Saturday morning turned into 1pm Saturday afternoon. I would NOT recommend them to anyone, the customer service and overall service is very poor and so unprofessional. Old Republic Home Protection assigned my HVAC claim to Affordable Heating & Air LLC in Birmingham.First tech(so called) that came quickly diagnosed a Freon leak and with no attempt to locate leak was going to inject a “stop leak” product. I refused to let him do that. The second person to come out was their so called leak specialist. He just as quickly diagnosed that the evaporator coil was leaking. He determined this without looking in the air handler. What a joke. Prior to the second person coming out, I paid a local HVAC company to come out and their Technician did a thorough inspection and located the leak in the accumulator as evidenced by oil residue and Freon leak detector. I would not use Affordable at any price nor a home warranty company that contracts with them. Affordable’s office person, Tanya, was very friendly and professional.

Timely, but no attention to detail or initiative. Came out. Saw that the unit was low on freon.  Filled it and left. Didn’t bother to find out why it was low.  I was told he didn’t try because “he didn’t have to.”  I would not recommend this company.

reviews.text: Wow!! I am so impressed with Sentry!! Woke up to no hot water. I personally called Charlie Conklin and told him what was going on. Instead of telling me the hot water heater was out and we needed a new one, they told me that the pilot light was out from last night's storm. I would have never known the difference. Charlie mentioned that could be the case and Tod came out and confirmed, while I was thinking we would have to buy a new one. Tod came with someone he was training and they were both so professional, polite, and honest!! We had them toilets and a few other things. Fair pricing and the best service!! Highly recommend Sentry for all of your HVAC, plumbing and electrical needs!

If you can avoid using this company to service your generators, I highly recommend that. We had a contract with them to come and service our generator. For the same appointment that they made us reschedule at least 2 times for issues on their end, they ghosted us each of those times. Today was the third. We called this morning to ensure they were going to be able to make their appointment and they ensured they would. My mother waited most of the day and finally had to use the restroom. Of course they called while she did that and they didn’t leave a message. She immediately called them back and they put the manager on the phone, and the manager coldly said sorry, you weren’t there and didn’t care at all about the fact no message was left and they had already sent the contractor off to another job. Talk about crap customer service and this female manager they have should not be working this job. I wasn’t there when she picked this job but if I had, I would’ve told her it’s not a good fit for her. My mother finally said, “look, if you don’t want to service our generator, please just tell us so we can cancel our contract and go find someone else to do it.” So at the end of the day, they don’t honor their contracts and there’s no point in talking to them about it because they’ll just tell you you’re SOL.
Todd and Omari were great.  They explained everything and were very professional and finished the job quickly.

Over the past three years I’ve had Sentry come three times to work on my generator.  #1 Tech serviced generator but did not refill with oil. #2. Tech installed oil then had trouble accepting that I did not want a service contract. #3. Tech said bad generator battery so I got voltmeter and showed him to be wrong (the battery clearly had a date sticker from three months prior.). So tech decided generator needed new battery cable clamps and he installed them and said all was well and I paid him.  #4.  Two months later a power outage and generator did not come in.  I inspected and see that the new battery clamps are loose on the terminals.  Called Sentry who said it was out of warranty and there would be a service charge.  I protested and asked to speak to an owner but instead was put on hold then was told they  would send someone but if the problem was not the new clamps I would be charged.  I agreed and then no one ever came.    Today I replaced the clamps as Sentry had installed ones that were too big.   So to summarize:  their technicians are incompetent. Their customer service is terrible. And they don’t stand behind their work.
Evan showed up earlier than expected and fixed the problem quickly. He offered some suggestions to what I could do to prevent the issue in the future. Overall, a great job.
Professional and courteous service. Highly recommended.

The whole process was great. Other than spending the money! Justin made the diagnosis Ben made the sale Jamey, Alex and Austin installed the unit and Loren did some follow up work. There was not a slacker in the bunch. Jamie, Alex and Austin worked all day and into the night to make sure that we had air conditioning before the holidays. Loren was able to figure out and spent a lot of time fixing our second air conditioner right after the holidays I would give them all five stars. all were extremely pleasant to work with and Personable.

I recently had Lauren from Sentry come out to fix our air conditioning and HVAC system, and I couldn’t be more impressed with her service. She was extremely thorough, answering all of my questions and offering great recommendations to improve our system’s performance. Lauren discovered that our HVAC wires had been switched, which had been reducing our system’s efficiency—a problem that had been missed during multiple previous services by other companies. Thanks to her keen attention to detail, our HVAC is now running better than ever. I will definitely continue to use Sentry for all future maintenance needs!

I am not one to write reviews but feel compelled to share a brief summary of our experience with your Company over the past 8 months (I am not affiliated with Sentry in any manner):
- You all installed a home generator for us in November.  We were very satisfied with the entire process from electrical upgrades required by the city to final installation.
- We are remodeling our kitchen and needed to relocate an air conditioning vent.  Wesley provided an estimate and the work was completed timely and efficiently.  Diego and Caleb performed the electrical work we needed; new circuits for the dishwasher and oven.  This is an older home and Diego came up with a creative solution to solve the problem!
- In the middle of our kitchen remodel, one of our HVAC systems stopped working and needed total replacement.  Lauren quickly diagnosed the issue and then Ben presented us with several options for new systems.  It was good to have choices!
Jamie and JT did the HVAC install and spent a lot of time working in a tight attic in the August heat to place the new air handler.
- Over two days, Wesley installed the new cooktop and downdraft vent system for the cooktop along with completing all the plumbing renovations and new waterline connections for the sink, dishwasher and refrigerator.  He is very knowledgeable, kept us informed of what he was doing and then showed us all the new turnoffs, shutoffs, etc.   It was a pleasure having him here.
- The ladies in the office handling scheduling couldn't have been more helpful.
- We will definitely continue to use the Sentry team in the future!

Otherwise, the unit worked fine (before this agent touched it.) I realize I’m eventually going to have to replace the unit but not when it works. I wanted the Freon added. All I know is after he left, the unit no longer holds Freon more than 4 days. It’s so sad that finding honest people to do work, these days is almost impossible. Giving this to the Lord.

I would NOT recommend Eagle Service for plumbing. They replaced a portion of our sewer pipe in our basement that we had been having clogging issues with. The new piping looks excellent and the problem seems to have been fixed. However... I had a couple of issues. They charged me an extra $150 for a 2nd visit that only took 10 minutes for him to confirm the issue (I believe this was refunded after I complained). And worst of all, he did not protect the work area and raw sewage dumped all over our washer and dryer, mop sink, basement walls, etc. I did not see this happen and it ended up being much worse than I thought. I asked him if he was going to clean up before he left, he didn't even sweep up the PVC dust from cutting the pipe. He asked me if I had a mop?? All he did was hose down the area and did NOT do a thorough job cleaning up the raw sewage or disinfecting the area. When I called the office to talk to a manager, they told me they have gotten calls before but that it was not standard for their crew to carry cleaning supplies on their trucks. They did not offer to send someone to clean up the mess. The Servpro quote was twice as much as the plumbing quote. I truly cannot believe they would leave someone's home in such a mess. It's a good thing it was in an unfinished basement!

After nearly 30 years in my home I’ve had several recognizable AC companies in town work on my HVAC and more often than not been left disappointed with one thing or another. This company was recommended to me be a friend who had a good experience so I called. It was during the first warm days of spring and everyone was slammed but Taylor made every effort to get to me in a timely manner. The first impression was a knowledgeable and friendly staff with a very professional truck and equipment. I was prepared for the worst but after a thorough inspection it was diagnosed as a bad starter capacitor. The brand that Taylor uses has a 5 year warranty. It’s unheard of for electronic/electric parts to have any warranty but Taylor explained that he insists on providing premium components for his clients and it saves time and money in the long run. Overall they had me back up and cooling off in no time. . Clear and precise communication combined with prompt service (he gave me a ballpark time and then called 30 minutes before arriving) and professional appearances and extremely reasonable pricing made me feel like I have found a HVAC I can depend on for all my future needs. I can’t speak highly enough about how satisfied I am with the work and new relationship. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of work on there systems.
